content: Again, in sync! Me thinks a proctology exam performed to a suitable depth would prove Mitch is missing many organs, including a heart. Amazingly, his Republican peers in the Senate think this, and the fact he consistently ranks as the least popular senator among those they are supposed to represent (in this case, his Kentucky homies), are reasons he should be their Majority Leader.
